casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

September, 1944,

(September 21, 1944.) Ike Mannheimer, Individually and on Behalf of All Other Stockholders of Lisk Manufacturing Company, Limited, Similarly Situated, Appellant-Respondent, v. Clarence C. Keehn et al., Respondents-Appellants, and Lisk Manufacturing Company, Limited, Defendant-Respondent.

Motion to amend order of June 28, 1944 [ante, p. 813] nunc pro tuna so as to add “ and the facts ” to the reversal and modification, granted. Present — Cunningham, P. J., Taylor, Dowling, Harris and McCurn, JJ.
